overview:
Jeff brings over 20 years of operational and manufacturing experience to Drobo.

Jeff has held senior management and director level positions at companies including Sling Media, Handspring, Solectron, Tapwave, and Lockheed Martin. Most notably Jeff managed global operations for Sling Media and helped grow the business which was acquired by EchoStar in 2007 for $380 million. In his years in operations Jeff estimates that he has shipped well over 1,000,000 products to customers, and managed supply chains totaling over $250 million. Jeff earned his Bachelor of Science degree in Mechanical Engineering from Santa Clara University.
